name: Premier Inn London Gatwick Airport South (London Road)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Let's be clear this is a 2 star hotel. Good size rooms sparsely furnished but with exceptionally comfortable bed with very good linens. TV with selection of channels and small bathroom with plenty of hot water - pity that the bathroom door opened directly onto (I think) the towel rail and had 2 actual holes in the door to show for it.
reviews.title: A basic product very well executed.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There is a kettle in the room and additional supplies readily available from reception. Seemed to be plenty of overnight parking without extra charge - and that is a definite bonus for the area. The faint noise from the airport is not iintrusive despite proximity. And that is it!
reviews.title: A good, restful stay

reviews.text: Chef and Brewer pub next door with popular restaurant.
reviews.title: One of the better Premier Inns

reviews.text: If you are looking for a no frills comfortable night this is a good choice - especially if you were able to book ahead and get a good price - we did not and paid about £55 for the night,
reviews.title: Great Value and Clean

reviews.text: I had occasion to stay at this hotel for two single nights before and after a holiday visit to Egypt on 30 September and 15 October 2012.
reviews.title: premier inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here the night before our flight and were pleasantly surprised as we had never stayed at a Premier Inn before. The room was very clean and comfortable and surprisingly quiet. There was no hot breakfast as they were having their hotplates replaced when we were there, but the continental breakfast was perfectly adequate, with good selection of cereals, breads, croiossants etc. Only problem was dragging suitcases across the cobbles between the bus stop and the hotel entrance. Not an easy task and should be looked at by the owners. Would stay here again.
reviews.title: Good location for early flight

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We found the hotel very relaxing for a night before our Flight to Sicilly. The beds were quite comfy and the room reasonably quiet and clean.The Hopper bus stopped outside the gate to pick people up. The restaurant was very good and the style was "Olde Worlde". The food was reasonably priced, although the hot plate was out of action in the morning, so we had Continental Breakfasts. The woman running the breakfast sitting was very helpful and chatty.The complex seemed quite large and the cobbled square inside the main gate, although blending in with the ambience of the surroundings, was not helpful to the wheels on our suitcases !! The bill was quite reasonable for us and it was better value than some of the Travel lodges we have recently stayed in. Obviously there was some aircraft noise about but this was not intrusive !!
reviews.title: Busy Hotel near Airport

reviews.text: I have stayed in Premier Inn three times and have never been disappointed by the quality of the service. The rooms are big, comfortable, modern and elegant. The price is very reasonable and the staff always friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Clean, comfortable pleasant and good value for money.

reviews.text: We stayed here with our two daughters before travelling from Gatwick the next morning. We know we can rely on Premier Inn and this was no exception.
reviews.title: Fabulous

reviews.text: We received a very friendly greeting on check-in, and our room was the usual at PI, big, clean, comfy beds, enough towels etc for everyone.
reviews.title: Great place for overnight stay..

reviews.text: I stayed at the gatwick airport South Premier Inn which has the Gatwick Manor pub and restaurant beside it.
reviews.title: Excellent place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Premier Inns in general provide great service but at this one staff like James at the front desk and Miriam go the extra mile to make you feel welcome and comfortable.
reviews.title: Very Pleasantly Suprised

reviews.text: It is excellent service throughout the whole stay and all the staff are happy to assist any time with anything you may need
reviews.title: lovely stay

reviews.text: I enjoy my stay there every year and always look forward to my stay
reviews.title: good price & convenient

reviews.text: My experience of Premier Inns was from years ago when I used to stay in them while attending conferences. My impression was 'you get what you pay for' I paid a low price and got a low standard experience.
reviews.title: Waving Bye Bye

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: First time to this premier inn as the north terminal premier inn was fully booked. Very friendly staff, only problem was the room was too hot even with the fan on all night. Time to get some air con in.
reviews.title: Room too hot, glad it was a one night stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Reception very welcoming and friendly, as are all the staff you encounter at the Premier Inn and the pub next door. Everything clearly explained at check-in (including the Good Night Guarantee).
reviews.title: Once again an excellent stay

reviews.text: Room absolutely spotless with everything you need.
reviews.title: Excellent for an overnight stay prior to an early flight from Gatwick

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 5 star service ensures I will keep staying here every time I use Gatwick regardless of which terminal.
reviews.title: PARTY TIME!

reviews.text: This was my second stay at this premier inn; it is conveniently located for both Gatwick terminals and the reception staff will order an early morning taxi. The restaurant next door, attached to the Gatwick Manor hotel is good too - Brewers
reviews.title: Beautiful setting shame about the reception !!!

aka: Premier Inn Gatwick Airport South Hotel Crawley
